name: Antonious Shehata
degree: Master in Computer Engineering, GISMA University - Germany

about_text: Full-stack developer with deep experience in software development, digital transformation, and agile leadership. Specialized in advanced computing and digital innovation. Hands-on experience in Python, C#, Django, ASP.NET, and database architecture. Strong focus on financial tech, machine learning pipelines, and scalable backend systems.
